jobTitle: REMOTE Plaintiff Attorney - Personal Injury or Property Damage
description:
With more than $1Billion won for our clients in 20 years of business, we are an ever-growing firm with extensive experience handling first-party claims such hail storms. We place a strong emphasis on the culture within our company, creating a family atmosphere with work/life balance and an open environment. We are seeking an experienced Property/Personal Injury Attorney to join our team and assist with first-party cases in both pre-lit and active litigation.

Apply today and take your career to the next level!

Top Reasons to Work with Us

  • Very strong compensation ($110-150,000/year) base salary DOE
  • Commission from piece of settlement!
  • No billable hour requirement
  • At our firm, you will have the opportunity to work with a team of professionals who are committed to delivering the highest standard of service to our clients.
  • Our firm offers a challenging and stimulating work experience designed to help you grow your legal career.
  • We understand that our success is dependent on our team of dedicated professionals, which is why we are committed to providing a supportive and encouraging work environment.

What You Will Be Doing

  • Handle a strong workload of cases from initial intake through settlement or trial
  • Work on complex first-party property and personal injury cases
  • Draft pleadings and conduct depositions
  • Prepare and respond to written discovery, motions practice, and jury trials
  • Supervise full-time paralegal assistant and work with them on a day-to-day basis

What You Need for this Position

  • 3+ Years of Experience as an Attorney (insurance coverage/first-party background preferred)
  • J.D. Degree or Esquire
  • Bar Certified: TX
  • Familiarity drafting Pleadings, conducting Depositions, preparing and responding to Written Discovery, Motions Practice, and Jury Trials
  • Competency in Case-Management Software

Benefits

Top Reasons to Work with Us

  • Very strong compensation
  • Commission from piece of settlement!
  • At our firm, you will have the opportunity to work with a team of professionals who are committed to delivering the highest standard of service to our clients.
  • Our firm offers a challenging and stimulating work experience designed to help you grow your legal career.
  • We understand that our success is dependent on our team of dedicated professionals, which is why we are committed to providing a supportive and encouraging work environment.

Benefits

" Health, Dental, and Vision Insurance

" Life Insurance and Long-Term Disability

" 401(k) Plan

" Paid Time Off

" Bar dues and CLEs

" In-house mentoring program
